rows.label: tev057301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev057301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Loma about New LA.

rows.label: tev057301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev057301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Loma if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev057301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Loma what things were like during the attack.

rows.label: tev057301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Loma about life in New LA.

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Loma takes role as aide of elder very seriously and
decided to do tour of city right after moving in.
It took FOREVER![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0002
rows.name: In fact, Loma needs to file formal complaint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Why is entire city full of fall-y places? So dangerous!
Loma has already kerplunged through gaps more times
than Loma can count.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0004
rows.name:
In fact, Loma kerplunged so many times that formerly
poor swimming ability has now become second-to-none
from so much practice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Lots of people get tricked because they think Nopon
are cute and innocent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0009
rows.name:
But if friend hears about Nopon breaking contracts or
doing underhanded business, friend must tell Loma
right away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Loma is aide to Elder Nan, and aide has to keep other
Nopon in line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0011
rows.name:
One shady Nopon breaking rules is enough to threaten
bright future of all Nopon merchants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0012
rows.name:
That is why Loma must deliver blazing uppercut of
Nopon justice to all who go astray.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Loma came back to city to make sure it was safe
enough for Elder Nan, but friends still not done
cleaning up aftermath.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0023
rows.name: Shiny blue blood was everywhere! Meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Loma was confused at first because most living things
have red blood, but now Loma understands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Loma hopes friends are able to get their real
red-blooded bodies back soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Loma is grateful to human friends for creating Mira
where elder can be safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0027
rows.name:
But even with Ganglion threat in past,
human city still poses many dangers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Large hunks of metal often come swinging by and send
unsuspecting Nopon flying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0029
rows.name:
And some human friends treat Nopon like cute pets
and try to take them home! Incorrigible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0030
rows.name: Work cut out for Loma to keep elder safe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Loma about recent developments.

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Loma just KNOW that Bodada is up to no good,
but cannot find proof. Where did that scoundrel
get the goods?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Loma carefully screened every single Nopon who
entered city...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Loma hopes BLADE friend will be first to speak up if
any suspicious Nopon activity is witnessed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Those pollen orbs are spreading like plague among
Nopon, turning them into do-nothing lazypons![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0017
rows.name:
As aide of Elder Nan, Loma cannot let crisis continue
unaddressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Loma about recent developments.

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Nopon authorities managed to confiscate all red pollen
orbs from Bodada and accomplice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Loma is sad for any world where evil Nopon try to
profit off red pollen orbs. Meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0020
rows.name: Assistance of friend has been duly noted![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Criminals will be sentenced to unpaid hard labor.
Serves them right! Meh![ST:wait ]
